Overall they are cute for a day but not much more.

I get compliments literally all the time. Anime fans like to call them "Deku" leggings (My Hero Academia). Very comfortable. Wear appropriate panties though.  I got a large, I'm 5'2" and 155 pounds. I have wide hips, thicker thighs, and a very big butt and these still fit me and look great (have a very hard time finding stuff that works for my body).  I actually loved them so much that when I messed up the 1st pair in the washing machine (velcro from other pants stuck on it and messed them up) I just had to buy a replacement. I highly recommend!

They're comfy enough but the picture is kinda blurry and they arrived already looking slightly faded out. It's not the end of the world or anything but they don't look nearly as good up close. The fade would also probably be less of a problem if you had darker skin than me (I am very white).

I purchased these leggings for a Halloween gym event, planning to dress up as Deadpool. They're nice overall, but the one I received had a misaligned center seam, which made the belt print look off-center. The material stretches, but if you opt for a smaller size, it might be too tight, and the print won't look as cool as pictured. The gun prints are positioned more towards the rear than the sides. I bought a Medium, and it fits okay. For reference, I'm 5'6", 135 lbs, with 37" hips. I had to return it.

Thin but stretchy material, 5'4" and 105 lbs - ordered a size small and these fit perfectly. A pair of tights underneath will make them warmer for the colder nights coming without changing how they fit.

I was a little worried about ordering these based on other reviews. I ordered Small. They’re not too tight but not too loose. They’re definitely more loose around my calves than most of my leggings, but that’s okay. I definitely recommend seamless underwear with these. For the way they fit me, they pass the squat test. The pattern doesn’t like up perfectly on the inseam but that’s totally fine. Material is a bit scratchy but not terrible.

I did not expect these to be made with that silky polyester material you can get in an under-slip for dresses. That stuff does not breathe and sweating in something tight-fitting is even less fun than the usual. It does stretch very well, though, so maybe working out in them would be ok if this is the type of thing you like to wear when exercising. It’s not for me.

评论概述: OMG! Super Cool and Ridiculously Silky Soft!
评论详情: I bought these to go with put together costume, no shock there (LOL), since "fake" armor can be awkward and heavy over time and body suits are expensive. So, I saw these and thought, 2 birds & 1 stone, those could work! (The birds got their revenge.)  Unfortunately, despite what my pictures display, this style has more black & gray tones, than the rest of my "assassin-elven-like" costume, (which would have been perfect if my corset, sword strap and belt were black. They are multi colors of dark brown and coffee colors). Maybe next Halloween or my next Con!  However, after trying them on, I found them to be so ridiculously soft and silky. Plus, they make me feel kind of bada$$. So in conclusion for me, I'm definitely keeping them and the print is amazing.  Beware, as some other reviews mentioned, there are a few spots where the white dye is saturated, it is a bit see through. But I tend to wear long shirts and I'll be careful about whose around when bending over (wink, wink) so it doesn't matter to me.

评论概述: Spectacular leggings! Will be ordering more.
评论详情: Can I just say that these leggings are amazing!? The material is super stretchy, comfortable, an easy to slip in and out of. They are tight enough to form to your contours in a flattering way, and the elastic around the top holds strong. There is no see-through issues (at least with the design I ordered). Speaking of which, the design is fantastic, true to the images in terms of pattern and color, and I've received a lot of compliments while wearing them.  I am 5'7" 150lbs with moderately muscular and toned legs. 'Medium' was the size I went for and the fit was pretty much perfect. I probably could also go for a 'small' if I wanted them to be even tighter, and they would still be comfortable (considering how well they stretch and contour).  I will most certainly be ordering a few more.
